title: Tugboats and harbors
brief_description: Follows a tugboat skipper, crew and harbor pilot through their daily work of moving ships in and out of harbor. Dramatises the enormous effort needed to get goods from one place to another, and illustrates the need for co-operation among many people to accomplish a large task.
description: Follows a tugboat skipper, crew and harbor pilot through their daily work of moving ships in and out of harbor. Dramatises the enormous effort needed to get goods from one place to another, and illustrates the need for co-operation among many people to accomplish a large task.
